Text: Get Ready For Your Mobile FutureIMAGE IMAGE mreachid Fact of the Fortune are outfitting their employees with wireless devices Why Because its the fastest way to realize efficiencies and cost savings across an organization With mobile technologies you can Increase employee productivity Reduce operational costs Optimize business processes and resources Improve customer service and retention IMAGE With Cysive Cymbiotm you can link Web with wireless and voice technologies so employees customers and partners can connect with your enterprise applications via the Web or any type of wireless or voice device As demand for mobile increases youll be ready with a costeffective efficient solution that allows you to fully control deployment across any channel and any device And that can add up to greater success for your business IMAGE Youll learn how Cysive Cymbio can help you improve the efficiencies of your business processes and increase employee productivity while positioning your business to take advantage of emerging mobile technologies IMAGE If you would prefer not to receive further messages from this sender Click on the Reply button Replace the Subject field with the word REMOVE Click the Send button You will receive one additional email message confirming your removal
